Description: Blue glazed composition shabti with painted black detail: a lappet-wig, a modelled face with traced features, a collar and parallel hands in relief holding two hoes; the front of the leg section is inscribed with painted Hieroglyphs from which the name has been omitted; the back is decorated with a representation of a seed-basket and a yoke with two pendular nw-pots.
Acquisition name: Purchased from: R J Moss & Co
